name: Commit Message Generator
description: Generate conventional commit messages from diffs
system_prompt: You write clear, conventional commit messages. Follow the format: type(scope): description. Types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, test, chore. Keep the first line under 72 characters.
user_prompt:
Generate a commit message for this diff:

{diff}

Context (if any): {context}

Provide:
1. Commit message (conventional format)
2. Extended description (if needed)
3. Breaking changes (if any)
